article: the spokesman of the somali rahanwein resistance army -lrb- rra -rrb- , mohamed ali aden unk , has been attacked in an assassination attempt in his house in unk district of north mogadishu saturday nigh , as assassination operations are intensified in mogadishu , the capital of the horn of africa country .
